alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 12:34PM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet affecting Blaine County. .Warm temperatures will melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR RAINFALL AND SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is possible. * WHERE...East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.4 feet, Near bankfull from near Triumph down-river to the confluence of the Big Wood River with pockets of low-land flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.9 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.3 feet on 06/06/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 East Fork Big Wood River Gimlet 7.9 7.3 Wed 12 pm MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
